definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: All patients recovered after operation except 1 case died of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數患者手術後恢復良好，僅1例死於尿崩症。

sentences.english: To summarize the effects of rehabilitation nursing for 112 stroke patients with dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 總結了112例腦卒中患者吞嚥障礙的康復護理體會。

sentences.english: All patients were treated with anterior interbody fusion and internal fixation.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者爲前路植骨融合加內固定術。

sentences.english: How to use fondaparinux in those patients?
sentences.chinese: 這些患者應該如何使用磺達肝癸鈉？

sentences.english: Patients in both groups re-occur without intraoperative awareness.
sentences.chinese: 兩組患者術後回訪無術中知曉發生。

sentences.english: Objectives To study the baroreflex function in patients with vasovagal syncope.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價血管迷走性暈厥患者的壓力反射器功能。

sentences.english: MethodsBoth eyes of 68 children with leukocoria were examined with CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 方法對68例兒童白瞳症患者進行雙眼CT掃描檢查。

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 並且對於易受傷害患者予以優先照顧和妥善保護。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to use spine immobilization techniques in trauma victims.
sentences.chinese: 有能在創傷患者身上使用脊椎板固定技巧。

sentences.english: The clinical data of 36 cases of severe pulmonary contusion was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 對36例嚴重肺挫傷患者的臨牀資料進行回顧性分析。

sentences.english: Diuretic-Refractory, Volume-Overloaded Heart Failure Patients Be Managed?
sentences.chinese: 控制利尿超荷衰患者應該接受怎治療？

sentences.english: But on the excision throat nerve outside may cause patient's range to have the change.
sentences.chinese: 但切除喉上神經的外支可使患者的音域發生改變。

sentences.english: These patients are told to blink their eyes and to respire through their noses.
sentences.chinese: 八位患者並告之以眨眼動作，並由鼻孔呼吸。

sentences.english: No positive reaction was found in both paragonimiasis and clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 與肺吸蟲病和肝吸蟲病患者血清之間未出現交叉反應。

sentences.english: This patient developed severe hepatitis with hepatic decompensation.
sentences.chinese: 該例患者患了重症肝炎，肝臟失代償。

sentences.english: The results indicated that gonorrhoea was related with infection of toxoplasma gondii.
sentences.chinese: 提示淋病患者存在合併弓形蟲感染的可能性。

definition: child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
a friend made in hospital or people who become friends in hospital/wardmate
sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient
